page.title: 09SERVICES, BURSTON AREA
page.content:
The petrol filling station has a small shop where sweets and cigarettes are available. Although this is the only one in the area there are a few more shops and a Post Office in the neigh- bouring village of Sandon. The nearest Doctor's Surgery is also in Sandon.
The County Library Mobile Unit visits the area fortnightly and a Mobile Grocer visits weekly. Although the groceries are expensive, it is a valuable service for people without transport. However it is uneconomic and likely to cease soon.
Most locals shop in Stone, using cars to get there as the bus service is so poor. Many car owners are willing to give lifts to those who need them.
